description:
A pack-sized version of Gerber new heavy hitting Bushcraft axe line. With its slightly canted head, the Bushcraft Hatchet hits the wood with more force than a traditional hatchet, making splitting kindling firewood a little easier. The over-moulded rubber handle provides a sure grip when choking up on the haft and transfers less vibration back to your hand. Tucked into the handle is Gerber’s “Gear Storage Stick” with room for 1.5m of paracord and 2 waterproof compartments for you choice of gear.

  • Flared cheeks make splitting easier
  • Canted head offers an improved mechanical advantage
  • Hammer poll makes short work of setting tent pegs, no matter how hard the ground is
  • Fibreglass-reinforced polymer handle is tougher and lighter than wood. It is moulded around the head for security
  • Textured, rubberized grip at the base of the handle and under the head – for when you need to do detailed work
  • Durable nylon mask protects your edge while not in use
  • Waterproof storage in the handle
name: Gerber Bushcraft Hatchet
